author: Max Greenwood
title: DeSantis gets rock star treatment at CPAC | TheHill
description: ORLANDO, Fla. — Former President Trump may be the main event at this year’s Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC), but the gathering also put in stark relief Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’s growing star power within the GOP.
